outputs.output_descr: The Project will demonstrate the effectiveness of non-burn health-care waste treatment technologies, waste management practices and other techniques to avoid environmental releases of dioxins and mercury in seven strategically selected countries.

project_descr: PIMS 2596 POPS FSP: Demonstrating and Promoting Best Techniques and Practices to Reduce Health Care Wastes and to Avoid Environmental Release of Dioxin and Mercury Releases and Defining their Functions
